#New section: exploratory visualization 

```{r}
ggplot(data = pie_crab, aes(x= latitude, y = size, color = site)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  scale_color_viridis(discrete = TRUE, option = "plasma")
```
